column3: Instead of a double-cast, can we say that the second argument to walletpassphrase is a 64-bit integer to begin with?\n

I found an issue where if the sleep time crossed the year 2038 the sleep would return in zero seconds making it busyloop. This is undesirable. The underlying issue appears to be in the boost sleep implementation.  I've addressed this by clamping Sleep() so that it sleeps for at most ten years.\n\nTo be clearâ€” the unlock can still last longer than 10 years, but some other sleeps in the code which d
